metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0157 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: (a) mount and (b) umount in util-linux 2.14.1, 2.17.2, and probably other versions allow local users to determine the existence of restricted directories by (1) using the --guess-fstype command-line option or (2) attempting to mount a non-existent device, which generates different error messages depending on whether the directory exists.

criterions.comment: util-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
